mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USERS U FULL OUTER JOIN TRAINER_INFO T ON U.USER_NO = T.USER_NO WHERE U.user_separator = 1 AND U.DISABLE != 1

SELECT T.user_no, U.user_nickname, T.trainer_name, U.user_message, U.profile_photo, T.career, T.employment, T.profile, U.location1_no, U.location2_no FROM USERS U FULL OUTER JOIN TRAINER_INFO T ON U.USER_NO = T.USER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{user_no}
